price: Akkam tahuu taa’an Yeroo maleeykonni isaan ajjeeftu, fuulleen isaaniitiifi dugdowwan isaanii tumaadhaa?
arabic: فَكَيۡفَ إِذَا تَوَفَّتۡهُمُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ يَضۡرِبُونَ وُجُوهَهُمۡ وَأَدۡبَٰرَهُمۡ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fakayfa idhā tawaffathumu al-malāikatu yaḍribūna wujūhahum wa-adbārahum
